column5: Heading up to Ear Falls in a few weeks, the place I'm staying at allows you to bring your own gas in. I heard that you can bring one tank of gas across the border duty free, true or false ? What if I have a 36 gal. tank, may I bring an extra 36 gal. across ? What would this cost as far as duty.... Thanx for your time. Nuf sed Diz
HI Dizz No duty fees just eat 36 gallons of beans the gas will come when we get there your smart a** FRIEND 188
